\subsection{Detailed Description}
Handle the pattern of a file stored in Harwell-\/\-Boeing or Matrix-\/\-Market format. This module implements the routines to read the pattern of a file stored in Harwell-\/\-Boeing or Matrix-\/\-Market format.

\begin{DoxyAttention}{Attention}
Currently, only support Harwel-\/\-Boeing format. (1) Harwell-\/\-Boeing (H\-B) format\-: Modified from the H\-B format loader routines written by Sam Williams $<$\href{mailto:swwilliams@lbl.gov}{\tt swwilliams@lbl.\-gov}$>$. (2) Matrix-\/\-Market (M\-M) format\-: not supported yet.
\end{DoxyAttention}
Also, refer \hyperlink{poski__LoadMatrix__common_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Load\-Matrix\-\_\-common.\-c}, \hyperlink{poski__LoadMatrix__HB__to__CSR_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Load\-Matrix\-\_\-\-H\-B\-\_\-to\-\_\-\-C\-S\-R.\-c}, \hyperlink{poski__LoadMatrix__MM__to__CSR_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Load\-Matrix\-\_\-\-M\-M\-\_\-to\-\_\-\-C\-S\-R.\-c}

Read the pattern of a file stored in Harwell-\/\-Boeing or Matrix-\/\-Market format, then store a sparse matrix in C\-S\-R format. 


\begin{DoxyParams}[1]{Parameters}
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em matfile} & File to read \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em Matfile\-Format} & File format in \{H\-B, M\-M\}\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
A sparse matrix in C\-S\-R format if success, or an error message otherwise. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
